legend.span: Indikator pertumbuhan bayi (monitor berat badan)
Indicator of baby's growth (weight monitoring)
Diisi N (jika berat badan naik sesuai garis pertumbuhan), T ( tidak naik berat badannya), O (tidak ditimbang pada bulan lalu), B (jika baru pertama kali ditimbang)
Fill N (if the weight gain is appropriate with the growth line), T (no weight gain in this month), O (baby wasn't weighed last month), B (it's the first baby weighing)

label.span: N (jika berat bedan naik sesuai garis pertumbuhan)
T (tidak naik berat badannya, berat badan tetap)
T (weight not increasing in line with growth chart)
B (it is the first time the child is weighed)

Fill in E1/E2/E3/E4/E5/E6 if the baby receives exclusive breastfeeding

legend.span: Status Gizi

Diisi M bila balita sakit di MTBS, R bila dirujuk, S bila balita sakit tidak di MTBS

S (the child isn't provided Integrated Management of Sick Child Service)
